headline: Walmart's OnePay boosts crypto; Lloyds' tech saves cash
summary: The retail giant is betting on the mainstream appeal of digital assets, while Lloyds' cash-preservation strategy gains steam. That and more in American Banker's global payments and fintech roundup.

headline: Assessing Visa’s Current Value After Latest Digital Wallet Expansion News
summary: If you are eyeing Visa and wondering whether now is the moment to buy, sell, or simply hold tight, you are far from alone. This stock consistently draws attention, and with good reason: its track record is impressive. Just in the past year, Visa returned 29.1%. Zoom out a bit more, and the story gets even more compelling, with the stock surging 101.3% over the last three years and gaining nearly 79% in five years. Even in the past week, Visa climbed 3.2%, hinting at continued investor...

headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Pismo/
summary: Zenith Leisure Holidays Ltd., a leading provider of Travel and Foreign exchange services since 1997, announces its collaboration with Pismo, a next-generation cloud-native banking and payments platform, to launch its own Visa prepaid Forex card. This strategic initiative aligns with Zenith's vision to enhance travelers' financial convenience by leveraging its strong presence in India's travel and forex industry.

headline: Thredd Launches First-to-Market Fraud Solution in Collaboration with Featurespace
summary: LONDON, October 08, 2025--Thredd, a leading next-generation global payments processor, today announced the introduction of One View, a first-to-market fraud solution developed in collaboration with global fraud and financial crime detection innovators, Featurespace, a Visa solution. The solution enables card transactions and non-card payments to be intelligently monitored under one, network-agnostic interface and rules engine to boost fraud detection.

raw.headline: Thredd Launches First-to-Market Fraud Solution in Collaboration with Featurespace
raw.summary: LONDON, October 08, 2025--Thredd, a leading next-generation global payments processor, today announced the introduction of One View, a first-to-market fraud solution developed in collaboration with global fraud and financial crime detection innovators, Featurespace, a Visa solution. The solution enables card transactions and non-card payments to be intelligently monitored under one, network-agnostic interface and rules engine to boost fraud detection.

headline: UK's Revolut to launch India payments platform, eyes 20 million users by 2030
summary: MUMBAI (Reuters) -London-based digital finance firm Revolut said on Wednesday it will launch its payment platform in India, its first foray into one of the world's largest digital payments markets, as part of a planned global expansion.  Revolut will let Indian users make domestic and international payments via its tie-ups with the Unified Payments Interface and Visa, starting with 350,000 waitlisted customers later this year before opening to others.  The fintech firm invested over 40 million pounds in localising its technology to meet India's data sovereignty rules, its only market where it has done so, a spokesperson said.

Revolut will let Indian users make domestic and international payments via its tie-ups with the Unified Payments Interface and Visa, starting with 350,000 waitlisted customers later this year before opening to others.  The fintech firm invested over 40 million pounds in localising its technology to meet India's data sovereignty rules, its only market where it has done so, a spokesperson said.
